name: df-xko
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cxko, cmpo(s0, s1, ctop, ctop, cfv(ctg, cfv(cfi, crn(cmpo(s2, s4, crab(s3, cpw(cuni(cv(s1))), wcel(co(cv(s1), crest, cv(s3)), ccmp)), cv(s0), crab(s5, co(cv(s1), ccn, cv(s0)), wss(cima(cv(s5), cv(s2)), cv(s4)))))))))
comment: Define the compact-open topology, which is the natural topology on the set of continuous functions between two topological spaces. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)
